patterns: what is the rank of ghrce?
responses:
Currently GHRCE is ranked 130th PAN-India in Engineering Discipline as declared by NIRF Ranking 2021.
	1st Rank in India at ARIIA-2021 among private / Self Financed College / institutions.

Established in 1996, G H Raisoni College of Engineering [GHRCE] is a premier Autonomous institution in the central India imparting a holistic technical education to the students residing not only in India but also international students. 
	The institution has always been ranked amongst a well performing institution by National Institutional Ranking Framework (NIRF), MHRD, Government of India.

patterns: what is the vision of ghrce?
responses: To achieve excellent standards of quality education by keeping pace with rapidly changing technologies and to create technical manpower of global standards with capabilities of accepting new challenges.
